item.title: Advaita sabhA ejection 2025
item.description:
рд╡рд┐рд╢реНрд╡рд╛рд╕-рдЯрд┐рдкреНрдкрдиреА

This is a record of shrI subrahmaNya’s ejection of vishvAsa from advaita-sabhA to cover up his blunderous twisting of shankara’s philosophy.

02/02/2025, 13:17 - V Subrahmanian: 02/02/2025, 14:41 - V Subrahmanian: https://youtube.com/shorts/tvux8AFk1t8?si=ydJ_4535YokQ6L2N 02/02/2025, 22:38 - V Subrahmanian: https://youtu.be/pEZzuRw7fqw?si=09OJQYfCE4AyoAeU 02/02/2025, 22:38 - V Subrahmanian: ЁЯСЖЁЯП╜ рдкреВрд░реНрд╡рдореАрдорд╛рдВрд╕рд╛рд╢рд╛рд╕реНрддреНрд░реЗ рддреГрддреАрдпрд╛рдзреНрдпрд╛рдпрдЧрддрдкреНрд░рд╡рд░реНрдЧреНрдпрд╛рдзрд┐рдХрд░рдгрд╡рд┐рдЪрд╛рд░рдГ 03/02/2025, 14:44 - Natraj рдирдЯрд░рд╛рдЬрдГ Maneshinde: ================== тАЬShruti beholds Saraswati as the Antaryamin and Akshara Brahman,тАЭ says Swami Brahmananda Saraswati.

It is well known that Advaitins regard all up─Бsya m┼лrtis as diverse manifestations of the same Brahman. This principle is clearly articulated by Swami Madhusudana Saraswati in his Siddh─Бnta-Bindu. While commenting on the eighth shloka of Da┼Ыa┼Ыlok─л, Madhusudana Saraswati expounds on the ─к┼Ыvara-tattva and states:
